data.comment: The match is underway in Utrecht.
Utrecht's Justin Hoogma has been booked in Utrecht.
In the minute 30, Eljero Elia scores to make it 1-0 at Stadion Galgenwaard.
Mark Van der Maarel with an assist there.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Utrecht.
Joris Overeem for Utrecht has been booked by Pol van Boekel and receives a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Pascal Jansen (Alkmaar) is making a first substitution, with Ferdy Druijf replacing Hakon Evjen.
In the minute 64, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Alkmaar.
Teun Koopmeiners levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
Rene Hake is making the team's first substitution at Stadion Galgenwaard with Moussa Sylla replacing Eljero Elia.
In the minute 66, Simon Gustafson (Utrecht) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The home team have replaced Bart Ramselaar with Adrian Dalmau. This is the second substitution made today by Rene Hake.
Zakaria Aboukhlal is replacing Jesper Karlsson for Alkmaar at Stadion Galgenwaard.
In the minute 83, Calvin Stengs is on target to give Alkmaar a 1-2 advantage.
Fredrik Midtsjo instrumental with a fine assist.
Juan Castillo is replacing Myron Boadu for the away team.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Adrian Dalmau gets an equalizer for Utrecht. The score is now 2-2.
